text: Uye Gwaro richagadzikwa (muruoko rwerudyi rwemutendi muhumwechete hwaAllah, uye muruoko rweruboshwe kune asingatendi muhumwechete hwaAllah), uye muchaona vatadzi vachitya izvo zvakanyorwa mariri. Vachati: “Matambudziko kwatiri! Igwaro rwudzii iri risingasiyi chidiki kana chihombe, asi zvakanyorwa nemanhamba mariri!” Uye vachawana zvese zvavaiita zvagadzikwa pamberi pavo, uye Tenzi vako havabati upi zvake zvisina kufanira
